body.p: Like the Windows Guest Additions, the Oracle VM VirtualBox Guest Additions for Oracle Solaris take the form of a set of device drivers and system applications which may be installed in the guest operating system.
The following Oracle Solaris distributions are officially supported:

li.p: Oracle Solaris 11, including Oracle Solaris 11 Express

body.p: Other distributions may work if they are based on comparable software releases.
